long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the TeacherHub extension, your ultimate source for the latest updates in teaching and education. It's not just an information hub; it's also your gateway to convenient Bing web searches and quick access to your favourite educational resources.

Important Details and Useful Links:

Data Collection:
Our service may collect Personal, Usage, and Search Data, all of which remain anonymous and are used solely to enhance your educational experience and refine our services. For a thorough understanding, please review our comprehensive Privacy Policy.

About Us - https://teacherhub.extension.news/aboutus.html
Contact Us - https://teacherhub.extension.news/contactus.html
Privacy Policy - https://teacherhub.extension.news/privacypolicy.html
EULA - https://teacherhub.extension.news/eula.html
Terms And Conditions - https://teacherhub.extension.news/termsandconditions.html

By clicking 'Add to chrome', I accept and agree to installing Teacherhub Extension and setting the New tab to https://www.bing.com is that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
